description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) CVE-2024-43496:

1. Update Microsoft Edge to the latest version (129.0.2792.52 or higher).
2. Ensure the system has the latest security configurations applied.
3. Restart your browser to ensure all updates take effect.

**Details**:
This update resolves a vulnerability that could allow remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted webpage. The issue arises from an out-of-bounds write, making it critical for users to apply this patch promptly.
To download the update, visit the official update catalog here: [Microsoft Update Catalog](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB43496).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure Microsoft Edge is installed and fully operational on your system.
- Backup any critical data before applying updates to avoid unexpected issues.
